text: We would like to apologize for the downtime of the bot from the 1st of June to 6th of June. It was caused by internet issues.
Sorry for the downtime! We transferred the bot to a new server for hosting, so hopefully we won't have as many downtimes!

We've fixed some kinks, but sadly there currently exists a seven second delay on specific commands if you have your AniList token set. There's not much we can do about it until the library gets fixed!
New command, /synclists! This will be required for you to see your statistics when running the anime or manga command.
We are proud to announce that we have at long last fixed the issue, making our bot faster than ever before! Enjoy these new speeds!
We'd like to apologize for the downtime from the 25th of December to the 30th. The main reason for doing so was that we wanted to halt the bot's activities as we waited for the bot to be verified.
